text: Bernardo Enzo Long Baccino (born September 27, 1989 in Colonia, Uruguay) is an Uruguayan footballer. He currently plays for Lincoln Red Imps F.C. on loan at Deportivo Guastatoya. ==Teams== * Rampla Juniors 2009 - 2014 * Deportivo Quito 2015 * Lincoln Red Imps F.C. 2016–present ==References== * Profile at BDFA * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Uruguayan footballers Category:Uruguayan expatriate footballers Category:Rampla Juniors players Category:S.D. Quito footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Ecuador Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Bernardo Long
